en: Phrenological Character of Master Wilson Bryan

This certificate attesting to Wilson Bryan's Phrenological Character was issued by Frank Fowler who identified himself as a Professor of Phrenology. The test was completed at Watertown, Wilson Couty, Tennessee. Identifies phrenology as a "moral and intellectual science," and claims that "Self-knowledge is the key to self-improvement." Phenology is completely discredited now and was viewed with great suspicion by many scolars at the time this certificate was issued (1858).
